name: Flappy Duck Bird Migration
description:
Flappy Duck Bird Migration is a 3D tap to play game where user play & control a duck that flaps its wings moves up and down through the bird migration columns.

Flappy Duck Bird Migration is challenging game, you can play and compete with other players for the number one🥇 and the high scores🏆 in world leaderboard.

This game is about controlling the a duck that flaps its wings moves up and down & how long you can control it. The duck will auto move up and down, tap the screen to reverse the direction. When duck moves up, tap the screen to move down and when duck move down, tap the screen again to move up

Let your duck fly and flap as long as possible through the migration of birds colony column. Don't hit other birds. You can use gun to kill other birds.

In Flappy Duck Bird Migration game, your score is the distance you travel, collect coins and eggs along the way. Eggs will give you bonus distance and you can buy or upgrade gun using coin

Keep play online and try to get the best score versus other players from all over the world and compete in the world leaderboard. Share your score to your friend, family, and the world and become the best Flappy Duck Bird Migration's player.

You just need to tap the screen to let your flappy duck fly. easy and fun!!!

✨ the Flappy Duck Bird Migration features:

• Various weapons and upgrade

• Free coin and free play without restart

• Leaderboard

• Share score

Flappy Duck Bird Migration game is easy and fun to play but hard to master.

Keep online to get the best high score and compete in leaderboard with player all over the world.

Let's go and play with us!!!
